tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  content TEXT,
  rating INT,
  date_posted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_content TEXT,
    approval_status BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_feedback_id FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES feedback(feedback_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  content TEXT,
  rating INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT UNIQUE,
  email TEXT UNIQUE,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  review_content TEXT,
  helpful BOOLEAN,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    rating INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    helpful BOOLEAN,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    rating INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    rating INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    helpful BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    category TEXT
);
